hudson.triggers.TimerTrigger.spec: # once in every 3 hours slot between 9 AM and 5 PM everyday (perhaps at 10:38 AM, 12:38 PM, 2:38 PM, 4:38 PM) #H H(1-23)/2 * * 1-7

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd /html/eol_php_code/update_resources/connectors
php5.6 process_SI_pdfs.php jenkins '{"resource_id": "10088_5097", "resource_name":"SI Contributions to Zoology"}' ##- 1st repo to process ##- generates 10088_5097.tar.gz
##php5.6 process_SI_pdfs.php jenkins '{"resource_id": "10088_6943", "resource_name":"SI Contributions to Botany"}' ##- 2nd repo ##- generates 10088_6943.tar.gz
